embed.description: **Junk** is an item players may accumulate over a run with a **Clunkmaster** leader. It will hit a card for zero damage.

fields.name: Mechanics
fields.value: With **Trash** and **Recycle** keywords, it can be used to power the effects of other cards. Additionally, Junk can be buffed through **Spice** or cards like **Tinkerson Jr** enabling it to deal damage.

embed.title: Junk
